name: Alchenemy
description:
(This is my entry for the latest Wowie Jam)

Oh no ! While you were tring to create magic chemicals (because they are cooler), you accidentaly created chemical... slimes ! Those littles bastards are spawning everywhere and have already dissolved everything in your house, but there is something worse ! If two slimes of the same color touch, it will create a magic shaft, and the world will come to an end. So you have to make them match by smashing them together, but beware, they will still react. Try not to die from a chain reaction !

Jump into this action packed arcade game and try to survive the Alchenemies !

Controls :

- WASD = Move your character around

- Click on slime = Use projection magic to throw them in the opposite direction from your avatar, they will either react with the first slime they encounter or stick to a wall.

- Up/Down arrows = Change music volume

- R = Restart

There are static images of the slimes at where they are going to appear.

One last thing : Subscribe to pewdiepie. ^^

By Luc Dercourt
